page.title: 13THE PILGRIM FATHERS
page.content: John Robinson.The Pilgrim Fathers connection. Sturtonis proud of it's close associations with the Pilgrim Fathers and particulary with John Robinson who beca,e their pastor.Robinson's father was born in Sturton about 1550 and john himself was born in 1576,the first of four children for john amd Ann Robinson.Their home is still standing and is called "Crossways"and at this present time is up for sale.There is hanging in the church apainting of the Mayflower painted by one of the parishoners to commemorate the villages links with this famous man.John later married a Sturton girl Bridget White and they had two children named after their grandparents.Sturton is not as famous as Srooby for the origins of the P/F .
